    • How to to do fuzzy membership based river corridor delineation

Compute Membership based on Linear Functions

computeMembership.Rd

Function to create linear fuzzy membership functions to delineate river corridor. The function can be either linear or inverse linear (see details).

Usage

computeMembership(index, x_cal_min, x_cal_max, type = "linear")

Arguments

index

spat raster or path to raster file in any format readable by terra::rast()

x_cal_min

numeric; lower bound of calibration range

x_cal_max

numeric; upper bound of calibration range

type

character; can be either "linear" or "inv_linear"

Value

spatRaster containing the membership raster for the specific index

References

Betz, F., Lauermann, M., Cyffka, B. (2018): Delineation of the riparian zone in data-scarce regions using fuzzy membership functions: An evaluation based on the case of the Naryn River in Kyrgyzstan. Geomorphology. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.geomorph.2018.01.024

Author

Florian Betz
